snippet: Speculation was widespread that the driver of a double-decker bus in Ottawa had suffered a medical emergency before the bus crashed into a train, killing six passengers and the bus driver.
abstract: Canadian investigators are at a loss to explain why a double-decker transit bus drove past a warning light in Ottawa, crashed through safety barriers and plowed into a passenger train, killing six bus passengers and the driver and injuring 34 others; there is speculation that the bus driver suffered a medical emergency before the crash.
lead_paragraph: Speculation was widespread that the driver of a double-decker bus in Ottawa had suffered a medical emergency before the bus crashed into a train, killing six passengers and the bus driver.

headline.main: Questions Swirl After Bus Plows Into Train in Canada
headline.print_headline: Questions Swirl After Bus Plows Into Train in Canada
